de.lessvoid.niftyinternal

Interface NiftyConfiguration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NiftyConfigurationImpl

    public interface NiftyConfiguration
    Represents configurable values inside of Nifty. Created by void on 13.09.15.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getBucketHeight()
      The render bucket height parameter.
      int getBucketWidth()
      The render bucket width parameter.
      NiftyColor getShowRenderNodeOverlayColor()
      This returns the overlay color to be used when showRenderNodeOverlay is enabled.
      boolean isShowRenderBuckets()
      If this is set to true all RenderBuckets will be overlayed by a random color.
      boolean isShowRenderNodes()
      If this is set to true all render nodes will be overlayed by a single colored quad to display and debug its position.
